stage_identity.evidence: Byte displays teen stage characteristics: gangly proportions, elongated limbs, awkward but energetic posture, larger form than baby stage. Facial expression shows big expressive eyes typical of teen form.

pixel_style.evidence: Clean 2D pixel art style maintained with dithered shading, readable silhouette, and consistent color palette. No photorealistic or painterly artifacts detected. Style matches expected pixel art aesthetic.

requested_changes_visible.evidence: Ecstatic mood reflected in bright eye expression and energetic posture. Posture shows slight shift indicating movement/animation between moments. Late morning bright lighting visible through Chicago skyline window. Trophy shelf with golden trophy and green plant present. Food bowl positioned on floor. All requested elements present.

artifact_free.evidence: No garbled text, floating glyphs, or malformed anatomy detected. No smeared objects or duplicated parts. Clean render with distinct object boundaries. Byte's form is coherent and properly proportioned.

prop_layout_integrity.evidence: Trophy shelf: exactly 1 golden 10-day trophy on left side, exactly 1 green plant on right side, clear spacing between them with no overlap. Desk: 1 wooden desk center stage with 1 oversized silver laptop. Food bowl: 1 bowl on floor to right of desk. All single-instance props maintained correctly.

anchors_present.evidence: All three required anchors visible: wooden desk with medium-tone finish center stage, oversized silver laptop open on desk, Chicago skyline visible through window in background. Room structure intact.

temporal_mood_match.evidence: Late morning time (11:43 AM Chicago) correctly reflected with bright warm lighting. Awake state confirmed with alert posture, open eyes, no Z symbols. Ecstatic mood (happiness 100%) visible in bright expression and energetic confident stance. Energy at 100% reflected in upright dynamic posture.

reground_cleanup.evidence: Not applicable for normal mode edit. This is an incremental edit (attempt 1 of normal mode), not a re-ground operation.
